contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 24, 1872 D Rawtenstall Contest
Rawtenstall Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
rawtenstall
Test Piece Contest
Pleasant View, Rawtenstall, Lancashire Promoted by Rawtenstall Brass Band - for local bands only
Set test had been written for the contest.
Prizes: £10, £7, £4, £2, £1
The fifth prize was awarded to Newchurch after a quickstep contest to determine it, rather than give it to the fifth placed band, as only 5 bands competed.
Oct. 21, 2012, 8:58 a.m. Aug. 9, 2017, 4:08 p.m.
1 Newchurch Unknown
2 Ramsbottom Unknown
3 Irwell Springs Unknown
4 Cloughfold Unknown
5 Water Band Rossendale Unknown
Withdrawn BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Unknown
